name: main

definition.annotation: This workflow takes paired-end Illumina fastq(.gz) files and runs Bowtie to map the reads against a reference genome (human, by default) and keep only the reads that do not align. MultiQC is used to aggregate the mapping reports.
definition.name: Host or Contamination Removal on Short-Reads
definition.readme:
# Host or Contamination removal on short-reads

The extraction of microbiome DNA or RNA is usually contaminated by host and human DNA or RNA (but also other contaminant). It is an important to get rid of all host/contamination sequences and to only retain microbiome sequences, both in order to speed up further steps and to avoid host/contamination sequences compromising the analysis.

This workflow takes paired-end Illumina fastq(.gz) files and executes the following steps:
1. Mapping of the reads against a reference genome of the host or contaminant (e.g. human) using **Bowtie 2**
2. Aggregation of the mapping reports using **MultiQC**

## Input Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end reads in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz` format.
- Reference genome

## Output Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end reads without the reads mapping to the reference genomes, in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz`.
- List of `JSON` reports of Bowtie2 for each sample that could be used as inputs for extra MultiQC
- MultiQC report of the mapping statistics in HTML

readme:
# Host or Contamination removal on short-reads

The extraction of microbiome DNA or RNA is usually contaminated by host and human DNA or RNA (but also other contaminant). It is an important to get rid of all host/contamination sequences and to only retain microbiome sequences, both in order to speed up further steps and to avoid host/contamination sequences compromising the analysis.

This workflow takes paired-end Illumina fastq(.gz) files and executes the following steps:
1. Mapping of the reads against a reference genome of the host or contaminant (e.g. human) using **Bowtie 2**
2. Aggregation of the mapping reports using **MultiQC**

## Input Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end reads in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz` format.
- Reference genome

## Output Datasets

- A list of paired datasets corresponding to paired-end reads without the reads mapping to the reference genomes, in `fastqsanger` or `fastqsanger.gz`.
- List of `JSON` reports of Bowtie2 for each sample that could be used as inputs for extra MultiQC
- MultiQC report of the mapping statistics in HTML

## When to use this workflow

Use this workflow for **short-read paired-end Illumina sequencing data**. For long-read data (Nanopore, PacBio), see the [Host or Contamination removal on long-reads](../host-contamination-removal-long-reads/) workflow.
changelog:
# Changelog

## [0.3] - 2026-01-19

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy4` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.33+galaxy0`

## [0.2] - 2025-12-08

### Changes

- Remove `ZIP_COLLECTION` step which is not needed anymore because latest `bowtie` version outputs the unmapped reads in a list of paired datasets.

### Automatic update
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/devteam/bowtie2/bowtie2/2.5.3+galaxy1` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/devteam/bowtie2/bowtie2/2.5.4+galaxy0`
- `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy3` was updated to `toolshed.g2.bx.psu.edu/repos/iuc/multiqc/multiqc/1.27+galaxy4`

## [0.1] - 2025-12-03

First release.
diagram_svg:
<svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" viewBox="0 0 780 400" role="img" aria-label="Host or Contamination Removal on Short-Reads workflow diagram">
  <title>Host or Contamination Removal on Short-Reads</title>
  <desc>Maps paired-end Illumina reads against a host reference genome using Bowtie2 and retains only unmapped reads, with MultiQC aggregation of mapping statistics</desc>
  <defs>
    <pattern id="grid" width="20" height="20" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <path d="M 20 0 L 0 0 0 20" fill="none" stroke="#c5d5e4" stroke-width="0.5"/>
    </pattern>
    <pattern id="grid-major" width="100" height="100" patternUnits="userSpaceOnUse">
      <rect width="100" height="100" fill="url(#grid)"/>
      <path d="M 100 0 L 0 0 0 100" fill="none" stroke="#b0c4d8" stroke-width="1"/>
    </pattern>
    <style>
      .connection { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 4; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .connection-qc { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; stroke-dasharray: 5 3; }
      .connection-secondary { stroke: #25537b; stroke-width: 3; fill: none; stroke-linecap: round; }
      .node-card { filter: drop-shadow(1px 2px 3px rgba(0,0,0,0.15)); }
    </style>
  </defs>
  <rect width="780" height="400" fill="#f8f9fa"/>
  <rect width="780" height="400" fill="url(#grid-major)"/>
  <rect x="0" y="0" width="780" height="45" fill="#25537b"/>
  <text x="20" y="28" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="16" font-weight="600" fill="white">Host or Contamination Removal on Short-Reads</text>

  <!-- CONNECTIONS -->
  <!-- Short-reads -> Bowtie2 -->
  <path d="M 180 115 C 225 115, 235 120, 280 120" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Reference Genome -> Bowtie2 -->
  <path d="M 180 205 C 225 205, 235 140, 280 140" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Bowtie2 -> Filtered Reads output -->
  <path d="M 480 120 C 530 120, 540 100, 590 100" class="connection"/>
  <!-- Bowtie2 -> MultiQC -->
  <path d="M 480 140 C 520 140, 500 250, 540 250" class="connection-qc"/>

  <!-- INPUT NODES -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,70)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Short-reads</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Paired-end collection</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">fastqsanger(.gz)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(0,160)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="180" height="28" rx="4" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="180" height="14" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="#2C3143">Reference Genome</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Host/contaminant genome</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">(e.g. human)</text>
    <circle cx="180" cy="45" r="6" fill="#ffd700" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- PROCESSING NODE -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(280,85)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#25537b"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#25537b"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">Bowtie2</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Map reads to host genome,</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">keep only unmapped reads</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
    <circle cx="200" cy="45" r="6" fill="#25537b" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- MultiQC -->
  <g class="node-card" transform="translate(540,210)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="90" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="200" height="28" rx="4" fill="#10b981"/>
    <rect x="0" y="14" width="200" height="14" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="10" y="19" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="11" font-weight="600" fill="white">MultiQC</text>
    <text x="10" y="52" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">Aggregate mapping</text>
    <text x="10" y="66" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" fill="#868e96">statistics report</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="45" r="6" fill="#10b981" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- OUTPUT NODES -->
  <g transform="translate(590,75)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="150" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1" class="node-card"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="150" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="150" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="8" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">Filtered Reads</text>
    <text x="8" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">Reads without host contamination</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <g transform="translate(590,310)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="150" height="50" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1" class="node-card"/>
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="150" height="22" rx="4" fill="#f97316"/>
    <rect x="0" y="11" width="150" height="11" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="8" y="15" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="9" font-weight="600" fill="white">MultiQC Report</text>
    <text x="8" y="40" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="8" fill="#868e96">HTML mapping statistics</text>
    <circle cx="0" cy="25" r="6" fill="#f97316" stroke="white" stroke-width="2"/>
  </g>

  <!-- Legend -->
  <g transform="translate(20,355)">
    <rect x="0" y="0" width="740" height="35" rx="4" fill="white" stroke="#e0e0e0" stroke-width="1" opacity="0.9"/>
    <rect x="15" y="10" width="16" height="12" rx="2" fill="#ffd700"/>
    <text x="37" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Input</text>
    <line x1="80" y1="16" x2="120" y2="16" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3"/>
    <text x="127" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Data flow</text>
    <line x1="195" y1="16" x2="235" y2="16" stroke="#25537b" stroke-width="3" stroke-dasharray="5 3"/>
    <text x="242" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">QC/secondary</text>
    <rect x="335" y="10" width="16" height="12" rx="2" fill="#f97316"/>
    <text x="357" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Output</text>
    <rect x="410" y="10" width="16" height="12" rx="2" fill="#10b981"/>
    <text x="432" y="20" font-family="system-ui, sans-serif" font-size="10" fill="#495057">Report/QC</text>
  </g>
</svg>
